TEXAS WINTER STORM PREP
Because our houses were not built for this

SAVE THIS…IT COULD SAVE YOUR HOME

Drip faucets (YES, all of them)
Hot + cold.

Open sink cabinets
Especially on exterior walls.

Block door drafts
Towels, blankets, or door snakes = works just fine.

Find your main water shut-off NOW
Not during a panic at 2am.

Expect power outages
Charge devices, use surge protect ... See MoreSee Less
